website_summaries.verdict: An excellent quality watch praised for its workmanship and beautiful style.
pros: Owners give high praise for the sophisticated, elegant look of this watch, and it gets top marks for its quality design
Also rated highly in terms of fit and versatility, as the watch can be worn alone or with any or all of the bracelets
cons: Some reported issues with the gold plating wearing off over time

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful and recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, it looks very expensive and classy. I have it in gold and black as well. The clasps are removable so you can adjust based on your wrist size. The only thing that is a little difficult is getting the watches/bracelets on by yourself. I want to get this is every color available. Update: 3 years later Gold has now warped into a silver-ish color. Still was worth it though :) This would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan K.

customer_reviews.title: I'M SO HAPPY! BEAUTIFUL WATCH!
customer_reviews.text: THAT IS SO AMAZING! JUST 5 DAYS I GOT THIS IN CHINA! BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Yandan,He

customer_reviews.title: What my wife wanted
customer_reviews.text: My wife was scheduled for an interview, so I bought her this set. She loves all the pieces. They are lovely and she mixes them around to fit her mood. And yes, she was offered the job, but how much of that was the product we will never know, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant watch set!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift for mom but its clasp/lock was not working as it should. Requested a replacement and as usual Amazon was quick about it, thank you! I tried the watch on (see photos attached) and fell in love with it, now I want one for myself. It’s a stunner!
customer_reviews.author: Domina

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Collection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for myself. I'm very, very pleased with this purchase. At the time of this writing---May 24, 2017---I can tell you that all of these items-the watch and the 3 bracelets---look just like they did when I ordered them. Very good quality. Company shipped to me very promptly. Will do business with them again! Thanks for such a beautiful collection!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch! This is my second one
customer_reviews.text: My favorite watch! This is my second one. Mechanics on first one wore out, was 4 years old. Love the bracelets as well, although their luster did diminish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Anne Klein watches
customer_reviews.text: I love Anne Klein watches! This is probably my 5th or 6th watch from this brand and they never fail both in beauty and quality. I love this set, so pretty and just as pictured. If you have big wrists it will still fit and completely adjustable but their all on the slim side. Works perfect for me! It was packed well and arrived a day early.
customer_reviews.author: May@36

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and bracelets
customer_reviews.text: Great watch and bracelets. Very pretty. My wife just doesn't need any jewelry right now so I returned it, but she thought it was beautiful and the links allow you to make the bracelet/watch larger or smaller and it is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exception purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch set for my mom at a great sale price...my mom was elated when she received it...now whenever she attends any formal events she ensure they rock with her outfit... Men this is a perfect gift for your wife, girlfriend, daughter, mother, basically any female on your life you appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: collina johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, bright, and on time
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the watch, even on my large wrists. As others have advised, you can use a link from any of the other bracelets included to enlarge. I bought this watch because I wanted something loose in hot weather, and this both looks and feels good, with or without the extra bangles.
customer_reviews.author: T. Legge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift. I buy this for my friend and she is just in love with it . The rose gold is just beautiful and look perfect on her. I buying one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Yenia.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pieces, they look very real and very expensive
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I picked up this 4 piece set for so little (deal of the day). They are gorgeous and I have not broken out; I'm usually very very sensitive to non-gold or non-sterling silver. They look so expensive and they even have double clasps, one of which can be removed for smaller wrists. Just lovely.
customer_reviews.author: sskeels15

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set! The set arrived in perfect condition, played out evenly in the watch box. Everything looked exactly how it does in the pictures and was in the perfect Anne Klein shape as expected. I gave this to my mom for Christmas and she loved it! Very trendy and has multiple uses. I saw this set in Costco only in silver or gold, and was so pleased to find this in Rose Gold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and elegant. Hope it won’t wear out soon. Will come back with update in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Sat

customer_reviews.title: Gifting Success, Looks Better In Person
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my mother for Christmas. I was a little concerned about the crystal bracelet from the image, but it looks even nicer in person. The rose gold is so pretty. My mom took the crystal bracelet out and wore it all Christmas Day. Great, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MFK

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Looks dainty, elegant and sophisticated. May not fit comfortably on someone who has a thick wrist. I usually have to remove links to fit my skinny wrists but didn't have to since the sizing was just perfect with the extension link connected.
customer_reviews.author: Zelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Watch and bracelet set is attractive! I took links out of the watch and twoof the bangles to make it fit better. The watch still slips around perhaps due to weight. The face of the watch is larger than I expected but easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Delicate
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch great for small wrists, however, I am a little worried as although it looks original the bands don't look as gold at the rest of the watch, compared to other gold jewelry it looks like its already faded.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper look and feel than one purchased on cruise ship. Different gold color. This ones gold is very light. The other one felt sturdier and the gold was deeper, looking more authentic. The band even feels cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch and the bracelets are the perfect accessory ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and the bracelets are the perfect accessory for it. I don't like the fake diamond bracelet, but the two other ones are adorable and look great with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Borowski

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: A lovely set! The watch is pretty and easy to read. The bangles are stylish accessories to wear and with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Leighton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The watch pointer does not move, how should I do?
customer_reviews.author: tanyaxuanG035832 Paketdienst

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Oh dear God! What a beautiful, perfect and elegant watch set. I would like to have it in many colors.

customer_reviews.title: beauful watch!
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful watch and it's really cheap. I bought this watch for my little sister as a birthday gift and she loves them very much.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyChen

customer_reviews.title: Classy set
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my mother, but would use it myself. Even nicer in person. Beautiful gift

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have really been enjoying the set. Just gorgeous. Watch face is easy to read.

customer_reviews.title: LOW QUALITY CHINA JUNK. BROKE!!
customer_reviews.text: Watch broke within 30 some days. Horrible quality. Anne Klein has lost her touch. Used to make good stuff now junk from China w her name in it.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my girlfriend and she loves it. We ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my girlfriend and she loves it. We had a problem with the clasp, but Amazon replaced it and all is well. The instructions for taking out a link could be a little clearer.

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOVES THE SET
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for Valentine's day for my wife .... SHE ABSOLUTELY LOVES THE SET!!

customer_reviews.title: Too many links to take out
customer_reviews.text: They all have links which makes it hard when you have tiny wrist. Look great though!

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to any one
customer_reviews.text: I do not put my watch in water. I love the bracelets with the watch

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful, high-quality set of watches and bracelets.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set as a present for my wife at Christmas, who really liked this collection. He often puts it on and says that at work many people notice and make compliments. A beautiful combination of stylish items.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my wife for valentine's day and she loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift to self

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mixing and Matching!
customer_reviews.text: The watch and bracelets are very cute and are great for mixing and matching. Links are easily removable!

customer_reviews.title: Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch set!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I waited until it went on sale because...love this watch set! Most of my jewelry is gold and this makes a great addition. I can mix and match the bracelets I already have with the ones that are in the set. Would definitely get for a friend or family member!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: I was recommended this product and bought for my Bday
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this product and bought for my Bday. It doesn't look THAT good but it's okay. However after a couple of times wearing, the bracelets color fade away, but the gold color of the watch stays the same. Very strange. If you want a nice watch set, I'd say go for a more expensive and better quality one.

customer_reviews.title: Good time

customer_reviews.title: So oerfrct
customer_reviews.text: Um this is great! I have pretty small wrists and these fit just about perfectly. The size is easy to change- no use of screws or trying to find a paper clip.

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Heavier than I expected but in a good way. You can wear them separately, stack a few or pair them with other pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bangle Set
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! I gave this as a gift and my friend loved it!

customer_reviews.title: I love my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to own this watch set, so when I discovered they were on sale, hubby helped order it . Shipment was fast and it looked so more beautiful when I got it. I gave four stars only because they were a little too wide for my tiny wrist but after taking out a couple links it was manageable, but all in all it was a beautiful set.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding gift package.

product_meta.title: Anne Klein Women's Bangle Watch and Swarovski Crystal Bracelet Set, AK/1470
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Enhance any look with this elegant Anne Klein™ watch and bracelet set.
 * Boxed set.
 * Metal case.
 * Gold-tone bangle features a jewelry clasp closure.
 * Round face.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Black dial features gold-tone hour markers and hands and Anne Klein detailing.
 * Comes with three additional bangle bracelets: one gold-tone bangle with black enamel filling, one gold-tone bangle with a clear Swarovski crystal accented center piece, and one gold-tone chain bracelet.
 * All bracelets feature a jewelery clasp closure and an extender link.
 * Splash resistant.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 33 mm
    *  Case Width: 33 mm
    *  Case Depth: 8 mm
    *  Band Width: 6 1⁄3 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 7 1⁄2 in
    *  Weight: 1.35 oz
   
   






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Item model number :AK/1470
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :July 2, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Anne Klein
 * ASIN :B07NRRCJ5L

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #82,675 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #38441 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #220 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars876 ratings 

 * Watch Sizing Guide
 * Enhance any look with this elegant Anne Klein™ watch and bracelet set.
 * Boxed set.
 * Metal case.
 * Gold-tone bangle features a jewelry clasp closure.
 * Round face.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Black dial features gold-tone hour markers and hands and Anne Klein detailing.
 * Comes with three additional bangle bracelets: one gold-tone bangle with black enamel filling, one gold-tone bangle with a clear Swarovski crystal accented center piece, and one gold-tone chain bracelet.
 * All bracelets feature a jewelery clasp closure and an extender link.
 * Splash resistant.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 33 mm
    *  Case Width: 33 mm
    *  Case Depth: 8 mm
    *  Band Width: 6 1⁄3 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 7 1⁄2 in
    *  Weight: 1.35 oz
feature_bullets: Round watch featuring black glossy dial with gold-tone hands and stick markers
Set includes a chain bracelet, a bangle with enamel inlay, and a bangle accented with 36 Swarovski crystals
32 millimeter alloy case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
All bracelets use jewelry clasp closure with one extender
